header.description: No header-level scalars required for this report

rows.description: Flow meter readings with timestamp, 6 flow rates (FM_101-FM_106), and 6 totalizers

totals.description: No totals required for this report

semantics: All tokens are pass-through row values. No filtering parameters required. Time-range filtering handled via date_columns mechanism.
transformations: Format timestamp_utc as DD-MM-YYYY HH:MM:SS for row_print_date_time
Format all flow rate columns (FM_101-FM_106) to 2 decimal places
Format all totalizer columns to 2 decimal places
